title: Interaction of a source rich in phytonutrients (fruits peel pellets) and polyunsaturated oil (Tung oil) on in vitro ruminal fermentation, methane production, and nutrient digestibility
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Ronnachai Prommachart, Srisan Phupaboon, Maharach Matra, Pajaree Totakul, Metha Wanapat
